    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Sets up the activity for immediate use; sets content view, but this activity is intentionally never displayed. Sets the app's selected date to the current date and time.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - used for overridden method call
